exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce tower to an evaluable reference.

In environment T : Type R : relation T ord : order R chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)} inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\\ x <> y /\\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \\/ z = y)} x, y : T H : In tower x Unable to unify "forall x y : T, In ?M1673 x -> In ?M1673 y -> R x y \\/ R y x" with "tower y".

original: unfold tower. intros x y H. apply chain_sup. intros z Hz. unfold tower in H. apply H.
